44  if dagger_iterations != 0 :

46 
47  for dagger_iter in range(1, dagger_iterations + 1, 1) :
48  files.extend(glob.glob('./datasets/data*' + model + '*1_dagger' + str(dagger_iter) + '*'))
49  else :
50  files = glob.glob('./datasets/data*' + model + '*-1.csv')
51 
52 
53 
54  with open(files[0], 'r') as file :
55  header = file.readline()
56 
57 
58 
59

61  output_filename = './datasets/data_IL_' + model + '_merged.csv'
62  else :
63  output_filename = './datasets/data_IL_' + model + '_merged_dagger' + str(dagger_iterations) + '.csv'
64 
65 
66  output_filehandle = open(output_filename, 'w')
67  output_filehandle.write(header)
68 
69  for file in files :
70  file_handle = open(file, 'r')
71 
72 
73  for line in file_handle :
74  if 'Time' in line :
75  continue
76  output_filehandle.write(line)
77 
78
